title: LF Jungler for SumSoc OCS tournament
body:
Greetings  all

I am looking for a solid jungle main with teams experience to play for us in the SumSoc OCS tournament. We won the last one and are keen to grab a new jungler because the former parted ways with us. Hoping to look for anyone Diamond 5 above. 

-Must have a mic
-previous team experience
-Mature player (no trolling or toxic behaviour)
-Willing to practice and improve

We are a bunch of lads and I am sure you will enjoy playing with us a lot!! If your interested please add "rageblade"

Cheers

replies.body: I mean, I'm not quite Diamond V, but I am a Jungle main.
